document.discussion_title: We ordered a secret Shake Shack menu item that was originally offered for one weekend
document.topic_text: Apr. 26, 2016, 1:11 AM Please enable Javascript to watch this video Despite its strong fanbase , not a lot of people know about a secret menu at Shake Shack . So we took a shot at ordering a secret menu item the burger chain once experimented with years ago. It’s called the Peanut Butter Bacon Burger, and it needs to be brought back to life. Watch and find out why. Follow BI Video: On Twitter Share
